CRITERIA
Solutions will be evaluated against the following criteria:
1. It is well-designed
The engagement plan embodies Purpose movement building principles (appendix I-II), best practices movement
building framework (appendix III) and demonstrates a clear commitment curve (appendix IV-V) with a series of
actions (appendix VI) that drive members to deeper engagement over time.
2. It works
It is implementable over the next 3 to 6 months.
3. It resonates
The solution itself is authentic and easy to communicate.
5. It scales
The solution addresses Recyclebanks two key communities: 1) existing on-the-ground recycling and 2) the
growing online community.
6. It is sustainable
It can be practically implemented in a way that is economically viable.
7. It brings about real-world change
It generates online to offline action. It demonstrates alignment with the Recyclebank mission and brand values
Additional considerations: Target audience; the use of economic, social and informational currency; Gamification
strategies; Barriers to entry.
